title: FTP Insecure Anonymous Access
description: Clear, engaging description of a misconfigured FTP server allowing anonymous access.
hints: Explore the possibility of anonymous access.
FTP servers often have a default setting for anonymous login.
Check for any text files available to anonymous users.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of anonymous FTP access.
Learn to identify FTP server misconfigurations.
Practice using FTP client tools to navigate and retrieve files.
